info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:28PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elmore and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 828 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hot Spring to Tindall Ranch. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hot Spring and Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint around 830 PM MDT. Monument Butte around 840 PM MDT. Bruneau River Launch Site, Pot Hole Butte, Winter Camp Butte and Twin Butte around 850 PM MDT. Deadman Flat, Clover Butte, Juniper Ranch and Clover Creek Crossing around 900 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
